channel.title: Sqltrain on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)
channel.description: Recent content in Sqltrain on Rob Sewell (aka SQL DBA With A Beard)

item.title: PASS Summit, SQLTrain and My First US SQL Saturday
item.description: Next week is the week when I used to dread looking at Twitter and especially the #PASSsummit hashtag, watching all of those folk having a great time in great sessions and doing all of the networking. Last year I was lucky enough to attend for the first time and take part in Chrissy LeMaire and CKs pre-con, this year I decided to add a US SQL Saturday to the list.
